subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The San Francisco 49ers terminated the contract of quarterback Trent Dilfer on Thursday, possibly signaling the end of his 14-year career. Dilfer started six games for the 49ers last season, passing for 1,166 yards with 7 touchdowns, 12 interceptions and a 55.1 passer rating before sustaining a season-ending concussion.
